xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:title: XCCDF Benchmark That References the Validation Content for the environmentvariable_test
xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:description: This XCCDF Benchmark references the OVAL Definitions in the validation content for the environmentvariable_test.

xccdf:Profile.xccdf:title: XCCDF Profile That References the Validation Content for the environmentvariable_test
